
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex and called "ya"
# (https://github.com/yandex/yatool).
#
# Configuration files of ya build system usually named as ya.make. If ya.make file is presented
# at the  root of the repository, then this repository supports ya build. 
# 
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configuration, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build 
# system may be rejected.

add_subdirectory(unittests)
add_library(yt-server-cell_balancer)


target_compile_options(yt-server-cell_balancer PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)

target_include_directories(yt-server-cell_balancer PUBLIC
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt
)

target_link_libraries(yt-server-cell_balancer PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  library-cpp-getopt
  cpp-yt-phdr_cache
  ytserver
  server-lib-cypress_election
  server-lib-tablet_server
  yt-server-master
  yt-server-node
)

target_sources(yt-server-cell_balancer PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/cell_balancer/bootstrap.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/cell_balancer/bundle_controller.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/cell_balancer/bundle_scheduler.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/cell_balancer/cell_tracker.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/cell_balancer/cell_tracker_impl.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/cell_balancer/chaos_scheduler.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/cell_balancer/cluster_state_provider.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/cell_balancer/cypress_bindings.cpp

)
